categories.name: Docker
categories.description: To use the Docker features, use the commands below:

containers-allowed.partOne: In order to be able to use the gear-docker features, the names of the containers must be configured.
containers-allowed.partTwo: Enter the list of containers that you want to enable, separated by a comma. *The old list will be lost*.
containers-allowed.partThree: You can select all containers that begin or end with a given name. Example:
containers-allowed.partFive: `app* - All containers that start with app`
containers-allowed.partSix: `*app* - All containers that contain the name app`
containers-allowed.partSeven: `* - All containers. Caution. By doing this anyone can start, stop and restart all the containers of the host.`
containers-allowed.partEight: If you want to keep the current configuration say it: *keep*

container.notFound: Sorry, this container does not exist.
container.already: The container is already in desired state.
container.withoutPermission: It is not allowed to manipulate this container.
